page.title: 01Landscape - South Wendron
page.content: This block is situated on the southern edge of the Carnmenellis granite mass and was at one time a very important {Tin and Copper Mining {Area. }This has had a great effect upon the{Landscape}of part of the area. A {Tourist Attraction,}based upon the mining history of the area and sited at the old Wheal Roots Mine is described later. Today, {Farming}is the most widespread activity and is dealt with in more detail in later pages, as are {School and Home Life, Recreation, {Local Events, Trade, Transport and {Local History.}
